title.narrative: KGZ/Supporting the judicial protection of journalists in Kyrgyzstan by strengthening the potential of linguistic expertise

description.narrative: In the Kyrgyz judicial system linguistic experts are often called upon to make determinations on the texts in media reports particularly with regard to their possibly libelous character or incitement to religious and ethnic hatred. However there are few tr ained linguistic experts in the country and no uniform training materials.The project aims at strengthening the capacity of linguistic experts and journalists through trainings and by drafting the first reference manual on the subject. Linguistic experts t rained in a uniform manner and aware of international media freedoms and standards are much better able to give informed and unbiased testimony in courts hence assisting individual journalists and media outlets in providing a qualified defense. Journalists also can resort to a professional linguist during pre-trial detention and in conflict on disputed texts.
